.: Plot:.
"Dexter" (English: Dexter) is an American television series starring Michael C. Hall as serial killer Dexter Morgan, who works in the laboratory for blood analysis to police headquarters in Miami. The series is based on the novel Darkly Dreaming Dexter by Jeff Lindsay. On November 2, 2006 on Showtime team began work on the second season of the series. It is believed that the story will be based on the second novel in the series about Dexter, Dearly Devoted Dexter. On December 14, 2006 Michael C. Hall was nominated for a Golden Globe Award in the category "Best Actor in a Television Drama Series."
